TopicTitle: "Duna, Ore Bust!" -- a KSP Graphic Novel (COMPLETE)

Articles.Content: The first image does not work.

Strange. Can you see it here?

> ![NmhbrLW.png](http://i.imgur.com/NmhbrLW.png)
Yep, it works on your last post.

> 
> Yep, it works on your last post.

Thanks--I re-re-edited the original post. If that doesn't appear for you it may be a cache issue, and if it's something else then at least you can look at the page in post #452. (#452? Really? Wow.)

The original post is working fine now. Thanks; and good work, Kuzzter. 

For what it's worth, I thought Val's expression in the last image was just right -looks like she's raising her voice in frustration.

All right, seems to have been fixed in the OP.

Thanks.

"We'll see just what stuff Bill is made of before his tale is finished... "

Only the Right Stuff... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I loved Val's insight on her crew. Especially Bill. Pounding on the Fourth Wall much? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Oh man, not having an IVA was the reason I almost never ever used the Mk2 and Mk3.

And I wish I could possibly tell you how incredible your KSP graphic novels are. They've been the spice of my life the last two days. Inspiring.

Or put him in one of the mk3 cockpit's old IVA's:

![hflOzZS.png](http://i.imgur.com/hflOzZS.png)

Or, even more evilly:

![black-windows_542931.jpg](https://writergirlkp.files.wordpress.com/2013/11/black-windows_542931.jpg)

> 
> Isn't that the old OLD mk2 1.25 inline cockpit? (KSP's part naming system makes so much sense!)

It's actually the old Mk 1 Inline Cockpit. They replaced that cockpit in 1.0, but that old one always had that placeholder IVA.

Kuzzter, I'm looking forward to seeing Val and Bill go to work on Gene. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

As always, thank you and...

Happy landings!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-26T00:49:35Z" title="08/26/2015 12:49  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 26, 2015</time> by Starhawk**

> 
> It's actually the old Mk 1 Inline Cockpit. They replaced that cockpit in 1.0, but that old one always had that placeholder IVA.

They've replaced it twice, once in 1.0 and again in 1.0.3/4. So that's the double old model ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif).

> 
> I'm looking forward to seeing Val and Bill go to work on Gene. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Well, Gene has to be the most BadS Kerbal to have the job he's got and keep it so long. There have been several attempts on his life in my universe and the result has been Gene sending out the pressgangs to fill holes in the roster. Gene's lke DÃƒÂ«thklÃƒÂ¶k's laywer. Don't mess with him.

But on the plus side, at least Walt got some good reaction video ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).

> 
> But how do kerbals get in/out?

The same way you can transfer 300 tons of fuel between two ships that are only attached by a grappling claw, I guess. Hm, can you also transfer Kerbals through a klaw? I don't think I've tried that.

> 
> And I wish I could possibly tell you how incredible your KSP graphic novels are. They've been the spice of my life the last two days. Inspiring.

I think you're both right. Let's hope it doesn't come to that, but if it does--wow, I'm writing this and I don't even know who'll come out on top!
